about_the_game:
Help the Noidz escape from Cyberia and see how far you can get in the Jungles of CBG and beyond! High Flyer is an action packed flying experience in endless scroller format. Unlock new characters, items and charge up
your Lit & Shroom Meters to boost scores and gain rewards. Avoid obstacles and all the machinations of Dr. Buzzkill and Goons and show off your accomplishments to friends via cool social media functions. Complete Daily Challenges to unlock exclusive gear and avatars for your Trophy Case.

Storyline

Based on the Krypto Kronic franchise and the Krypto Kronicles books, High Flyer brings a fun experience to users while highlighting the epic tales found in Krypto Kronicles. Dabby and his fellow Noidz have been kidnapped under threat of experimentation by Blade Corp and Dr. Buzzkill. Miraculously, a supernatural occurrence has allowed him to escape and with the help of some young activists. Now he must navigate various terrains to find his friends and become a true High Flyer!

content_descriptors.notes: High Flyer is a cannabis themed adventure showcasing a plethora of items and iconography associated with cannabis usage.

name: High Flyer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Athlon II X4 640
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 230 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 / AMD Radeon R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 230 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Soar to new heights in High Flyer, an endless runner game where agility & quick reflexes are key. Navigate vibrant aerial worlds, dodge obstacles, and collect power-ups. Unlock unique characters, compete in race-themed challenges, and climb global leaderboards. Experience endless fun and excitement!
